name: Wonderland Fever
description:
Hi! Welcome to Wonderland Fever! You are Alice, a girl who stumbled into Wonderland. While exploring the amazing land, you accidentally drink a "Drink Me" potion. 

Unfortunately, this one does not make you grow or shrink. Rather, it switches life and death itself!

Now, to survive, you must RUN INTO enemies, instead of avoiding them. The lower your health, the better! However, if your health goes down to zero, well, it's game over for you. Just so you know, you will periodically heal.

So what are you waiting for?! Go play it right now! Remember, get your health the lowest possible without dying.

For the smart kids, here are the controls:

ACTIONHOW TO EXECUTE ACTION?Move RightHold Right Arrow Key or "D"
Move LeftHold Left Arrow Key or "A"JumpPress Up Arrow Key or "W"

Some quick rules:

  • You can only jump once, and cannot jump until you touch a platform or enemy, however, you can touch the platform or enemy anywhere, including the sides of it!
  • To actually end the game and get a score of not 0, go to the far right of the map until you touch the doors, automatically ending the game.
  • When you run into an enemy, your health will decrease and the enemy will disappear, and then reappear after a while. 
  • Due to some bugs, you may experience enemies not spawning where they originally were, and instead of spawning on top of other enemies.
  • That is it! Go have fun! Please leave any comments or suggestions you may have below!
